article_title: Company hired to standardize doctors' orders

article_metadata.description: An arrangement with a San Francisco-based technology company, hammered out and formalized last month, was fully adopted Wednesday night by the Phelps County Regional Medical Center board of trustees.
article_metadata.author: R.D. Hohenfeldt
